scenes.background: Bob crosses his arms, looking skeptical.
scenes.description: Maybe we should set some priorities first. What do you think?

options.text: Setting priorities can help us stay focused and efficient.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical approach that emphasizes focus and efficiency, demonstrating good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I agree. Prioritizing now can save us a lot of trouble later.
options.analysis: You supported the idea of prioritizing, showing good emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: Honestly, we might be overthinking this. Just stick to the original tasks.
options.analysis: You emphasized sticking to the original plan, showing strong motivation but a lack of emotional perception and empathy.
